summary: BLOCK 73.5.1 Phase Hover Intelligence testing completed - Backend fully functional, frontend integration blocked by deployment configuration issues

integration_issues.issue: Frontend cannot fetch data from backend due to external ingress configuration issues
integration_issues.symptoms: 404 errors for all API calls to external URL, WebSocket connection failures
integration_issues.technical_details: REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL points to https://fractal-engine.preview.emergentagent.com but ingress returns 404 for /api/* routes. Local backend on localhost:8001 works perfectly.

integration_issues.issue: PhaseTooltip component cannot display due to missing chart data
integration_issues.symptoms: No phase tooltips appear on hover, 'Failed to load strategy data' error message
integration_issues.root_cause: Frontend-backend connectivity issue prevents data fetching

passed_tests: Backend API /api/fractal/v2.1/chart returns correct phaseStats structure
PhaseStats contains all required fields: durationDays, phaseReturnPct, volRegime, matchesCount
Phase data validation passes for all phase types and volatility regimes
Phase zones and phase stats properly aligned (29 zones, 29 stats)
Chart data completeness verified (365 candles, 365 SMA points)
Frontend application loads correctly on localhost:3000
Fractal chart canvas element renders successfully
PhaseTooltip component code structure is correct with data-testid attributes

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All phase stats functionality working perfectly
success_percentage.overall: 60% - Core functionality implemented but deployment issues prevent full testing

items: Fix external ingress configuration - /api/* routes return 404 instead of routing to backend port 8001
Verify Kubernetes ingress rules are correctly mapping /api routes to backend service
Check if REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL needs to be updated or if ingress needs reconfiguration
Alternative: Update frontend to use localhost:8001 for development testing if external deployment is not priority
action_item_for_main_agent.technical_context: Backend phase stats functionality is 100% working on localhost:8001. Frontend loads correctly but gets 404 errors when trying to fetch data from external URL. This is purely a deployment/infrastructure issue, not a code issue.
verification_steps: After fix: Verify phase tooltips appear when hovering over chart phases
Confirm WebSocket connections work without constant reconnection attempts
